data.title: The hourglass
data.statement: In this exercise, you will have to write a program which, leaving of a word, will have to give the illusion of an hourglass.

data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1:>> String [[message]] which have the sentence.
The Length of [[message]] is necessarily odd.
data.outputDescription: Like in the example, you must print an hourglass.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

In this exercise, you will have to write a program which, leaving of a word, will have to give the illusion of an hourglass.
Input
Line 1: String message which have the sentence.
The Length of message is necessarily odd.
Output
Like in the example, you must print an hourglass.
Constraints
If message is not of an odd length, you must print "Error";
0<= message.length()
message.length() % 2 != 0
Example
Input
Test467
Output
Test467
 est46
  st4
   t
  st4
 est46
Test467
